paper_abstract: This paper considers the resolution of finite fuzzy relation equations with sup-inf composition over a bounded Brouwerian lattice. The solution sets of finite fuzzy relation equations on a bounded Brouwerian lattice are described in a similar way as those of linear spaces of n-dimensional vectors in linear algebra. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Solution sets of finite fuzzy relation equations with sup-inf composition over bounded Brouwerian lattices
